medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced abdominal pain since yesterday, initially thought to be normal gastritis. He was helped with a GI cocktail but then noted new lower abdominal pain. He also endorses nausea and some chills.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of gastritis endoscopy proven, H. pylori positive s/p triple therapy.
